thread.title: Passengers share romantic messages on Valentine's Day
thread.title_full: Passengers share romantic messages on Valentine's Day | London - ITV News

author: itv.com
title: Passengers share romantic messages on Valentine's Day
text:
You can say it with flowers, you can say it with chocolates. Or if you're a Southeastern passenger you can say it on the information board.
Southeastern @Se_Railway Follow RT @ geofftech : â€¦ send my love to @ norwegiancheese in the form of a departure board. #Iliketrains https://t.co/nCtELgCspY
11:37 - 14 Feb 2017 Retweet Reply Favourite Lovestruck commuters have been leaving very public Valentine's messages on platform message boards.
Southeastern @Se_Railway Follow RT @ mr_robot_london : @ se_railway thank you so much. https://t.co/KoJ6A4azp2
12:46 - 14 Feb 2017 Retweet Reply Favourite From a simple 'Happy Valentine's' to 'Love from your Woofy Woos', all sorts of messages have been popping up.
Southeastern @Se_Railway Follow RT @ magicmolko : @ se_railway Ahhh thank you for putting my message on the board at Lower Sydenham #se_cupid https://t.co/5Jaw9g90aV
09:33 - 14 Feb 2017 Retweet Reply Favourite Last updated Tue 14 Feb 2017 London
